class FastParser[source]

FastParser(lang:str)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

FastParser.get_params[source]

FastParser.get_params(mthd:str)

Returns the parameters of a given method

:param mthd: the method to get the parameters from :returns: the parameters of the given method as an array

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
mthd = """public static void main(
    String[] args, Object clazz
) {
    System.out.println(args[0]);
}
"""
parser = FastParser('java')
parser.get_params(mthd)

Repo already exists, continuing.

['args', 'clazz']
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
mthd = """private static void _getAccessors(
				final Class<?> clazz
				)
{
	Map<String, PropertyAccessor>  accessors = null;

	synchronized (_ACCESSORS_REG_) {
		accessors = _ACCESSORS_REG_.get( clazz );
		if (accessors == null) {
			accessors = PropertyAccessor.findAll( clazz );
			_ACCESSORS_REG_.put( clazz, accessors );
		}
	}

	return accessors;
}"""
parser = FastParser('java')
parser.get_params(mthd)

Repo already exists, continuing.

['clazz']
